transcripts.text: Every African president needs security to protect his life, especially when on the move.  Welcome to Tunachiki, and in this video, we present the top 10 most impressive African presidential convoys and motorcades.  If you like informative and educative African videos, be sure to subscribe and hit the notification bell so you don't miss any of our latest videos.  Number 10, Zimbabwe's president, Emerson Monanaga's motorcade.  Number nine, Cameroon's president, Paul Diaz Motokin.  Number eight, Ethiopia's Prime Minister, E.B.  Hamets Motokede.  Number seven, Uganda's president, Yoweri Museveni's Motukede.  Number six, Rwanda's president, President Paul Kagame's Motukede.  Number five, Tanzania's president, John Makufulis Motukede.  Number four, Ghana's president, Nana Akufu Adus Motukede.  Number three, Nigeria's President, Muhammad Ubu Haris Motukede.  Number two, Kenya's President, Uhuru Kenyatta Motukede.  Number one, South Africa's president, Cyril Ramaphosa Motokede.  remember to subscribe and ring the notification icon so you don't miss any of our African videos.  And remember to leave your suggestions of topics to cover in the comments below.
